gist.headline: Theta AI joins the gallery
gist.blurb: A new creative tool has been spotted in the wild. Theta AI is now listed in our apps collection for all your image generation needs.
gist.summary: Added Theta AI to the Creative apps list, enabling image generation in multiple styles and resolutions.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access Theta AI directly from the community apps showcase.
gist.visual_concept: Polly the bee visiting a digital art gallery. She is looking at a new framed artwork or monitor displaying the Greek letter Theta. The vibe is creative and welcoming.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot in a digital art gallery, admiring a new canvas displaying a glowing lime green (#ecf874) Theta symbol. Soft pastel gradient background. The bee wears a tiny artist beret. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'THETA'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
